kpi.name: LTE_5293c

kpi_info.title: E-UTRAN average PDCP Layer Active Cell Throughput DL for QCI1 DRBs
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the average PDCP layer throughput per cell in downlink direction for QCI1 DRBs.
kpi_info.use_experience: The throughput is calculated as ratio of the PDCP SDU data volume and sum of time units where there is transmitted data.

kpi.kpi_alias: E-UTRAN ave PDCP layer cell thr DL QCI1 DRBs
